content.introduction:
cert-fio38-c
 redirects here as an alias for this check.

Flags dereferences and non-pointer declarations of objects that are
not meant to be passed by value, such as C FILE objects or POSIX

pthread_mutex_t
 objects.

References
Â¶


This check corresponds to CERT C++ Coding Standard rule 
FIO38-C. Do not copy a FILE object
.
